short_summary: Morden Research and Development Centre requires a power hiller for potatoes.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Request for Proposal: Land and Soil Preparation**

**Reference Number:** WS3715462990-Doc3732562753

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** November 10, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 20, 2022, 14:00:00

**Amendment Date:** December 7, 2022

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Objectives:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers to provide a two-row power hiller for the Morden Research and Development Centre in Morden, Manitoba.

**Background:**

The Centre supports various cropping programs both on station and off-station. The Centre currently has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) two-row power hiller for potatoes.

**Scope of Work:**

The proposed two-row power hiller must be new and of the current production model. The equipment will be used over many years in preparing potato research plots to support progress in field research on potato agronomy.

**Specifications:**

* The two-row power hiller must be capable of efficiently preparing potato research plots.
* The equipment must be suitable for use in a research setting.
* The proposed model must be of the current production model.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Price
* Technical capability of the proposed two-row power hiller

**Greetings and Closing:**

Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) by the deadline of December 20, 2022, at 14:00:00. For more information, please contact Jim Stoesz, SPAC/PSPC, at (613) 990-4444 or by email at [jim.stoesz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jim.stoesz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
